CreateDedicatedClusterDCDBInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dcdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDedicatedClusterDCDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Zone": "xx",
    "ShardNodeMemory": 0,
    "ShardNodeCpu": 0,
    "ShardNodeNum": 0,
    "ShardMachine": "xx",
    "ResourceTags": [
        {
            "TagKey": "xx",
            "TagValue": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "ClusterId": "xx",
    "DcnRegion": "xx",
    "SubnetId": "xx",
    "DbVersionId": "xx",
    "DcnInstanceId": "xx",
    "GoodsNum": 0,
    "ProjectId": 1,
    "ShardNodeStorage": 0,
    "VpcId": "xx",
    "InstanceName": "xx",
    "Cpu": 0,
    "ShardNum": 0,
    "SecurityGroupId": "xx",
    "ShardMemory": 0,
    "ShardStorage": 0,
    "Pid": 100
}
CreateDedicatedClusterDCDBInstance.title: input demo1

FlushBinlog.document:
当需要最新的binlog文件时调用。
该api相当于在mysqld中执行flush logs。binlog切分后将自动上传到cos，展示在控制台分片的binlog列表里，用户可下载。
FlushBinlog.title: 切分Binlog
